Name: Welcome Email
Subject: Welcome to VirtualAddressHub!
HtmlBody:
Hi {{first_name}},

Welcome to VirtualAddressHub! Your account has been created successfully.

To activate your London business address, please log in to your dashboard and complete identity verification (KYC) with Sumsub. This is required for compliance and usually takes just a few minutes.

Once your verification is approved (usually within 24 hours), your address will be activated and you can start using it.

üîê Get started:
Log in to your dashboard

Thanks for choosing us. We're here to help if you need anything.

‚Äî The VirtualAddressHub Team
TextBody:
Hi {{first_name}},

Welcome to VirtualAddressHub! Your account has been created successfully.

To activate your London business address, please log in to your dashboard and complete identity verification (KYC) with Sumsub. This is required for compliance and usually takes just a few minutes.

Once your verification is approved (usually within 24 hours), your address will be activated and you can start using it.

Get started: {{dashboard_link}}

Thanks for choosing us. We're here to help if you need anything.
